attributes.action: abolish the rate of stamp duty (SDLT) up to £250,000 and introduce a staggered rate reduction above £250,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish the rate upto £250,000 and introduce a staggered rate reduction above that:
£250,000 - £500,000 1 per cent, 
£500,001 - £1,000,000 2 per cent, 
£1,000,001 - £5,000,000 3 per cent, 
Over £5,000,000 4 per cent,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
